titles.title: Rural Broadband Window of Opportunity Act
Rural Broadband Window of Opportunity Act
To direct the Federal Communications Commission to prioritize the timely processing of certain long-form applications in the Rural Digital Opportunity Fund Phase I auction.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications and Technology.

bill.summary:
Rural Broadband Window of Opportunity Act
This bill requires the Federal Communications Commission to prioritize the processing of applications for certain rural broadband expansion projects that are located in areas with the shortest construction seasons (e.g., areas with long winters and heavy snowfall).
